original: The Parties, through their authorized representatives, hereby agree to the terms and conditions of this First Amendment.
ollama_generated: This First Amendment's terms and conditions are willingly accepted by each Party, acting through duly appointed representatives, under their own discretion.

original: Within thirty (30) days of the Methylotroph (or re -engineered Methylotroph) demonstrating such production levels of succinic acid, Bioamber will cease any  further funding and/or other support for the BRI Project. Further Bioamber will require that any unexpended funds received from Bioamber be utilized for a project other than the BRI Project.
ollama_generated: Within thirty (30) days of the BRI Project failing to achieve succinic acid production levels satisfactory to Bioamber, the company reserves the right to discontinue all further funding and support without notice. Moreover, any remaining funds previously allocated to the BRI Project by Bioamber must be redirected towards a project approved by Bioamber.

original: B. New Section 13.10 is added to the Development Agreement as set forth below:
ollama_generated:
Clause:
B. A supplementary provision, Section 13.10, is incorporated into the Development Agreement as outlined hereunder:

[New Section 13.10]
While Party A's primary obligation remains to complete the development project as per the agreed timeline, it is understood that unforeseen circumstances may arise. In such events, should the project completion be delayed beyond the initially set deadline, Party A shall make reasonable efforts to minimize the delay and provide prompt notice to Party B of any foreseeable extensions. The additional time required for completion shall not be construed as a breach of contract unless it exceeds an aggregate of thirty (30) calendar days without Party A's written justification for the extension. This provision does not absolve Party A from its obligation to fulfill the project according to the original scope and quality standards, nor does it limit Party B's rights to seek damages or terminate the agreement in accordance with the terms set forth herein.
